foray: ^(You were strolling around on your horse when you noticed).*(trying to pillage a local village.)
trader:
^(You defended villagers well. In exchange for your help, local trader offered you a deal you can't refuse. He is going to buy some of your resources for whole) .*(per item. However, he is leaving to distant lands and his caravan can only carry) .*(. 

To accept his offer, use /sc {code} {quantity}. And try not to turtle. He can only wait so much.)
order1: ^(Buzzing Tailor just set the orders. Check /order to get your order.)
order2: ^(For security reasons you are asked to run this additional command: /order)
